## cilium recorder list

List current pcap recorders

```
cilium recorder list [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for list
  -o, --output string   json| jsonpath='{}'
```

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
```
